snippet: A freshman at the elite Bronx High School of Science has accused teammates of physical and sexual abuse over a period of nearly three months.
abstract: Thomas Brady, Boubacar Diallo and Pier Berkmans, track team members at Bronx High School of Science, are arrested on charges, as adults, that include hazing and assault; trio has been accused by fellow team members of physically and sexually abusing a freshman member of the team over a period of nearly three months.
lead_paragraph: A freshman at the elite Bronx High School of Science has accused teammates of physical and sexual abuse over a period of nearly three months.

headline.seo: 3 Members of a Bronx Track Team Are Charged With Hazing
headline.main: 3 Members of a Bronx Track Team Are Charged With Hazing
headline.print_headline: 3 Members of a Bronx Track Team Are Charged With Hazing
